theRetrospect:IntoTheVoid.NAME: Into The Void
theRetrospect:IntoTheVoid.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Replay ALL theretrospect:timelines once and theretrospect:collapse them. NL Exhaust.
theRetrospect:IntoTheVoid.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Retain. NL Replay ALL theretrospect:timelines once and theretrospect:collapse them. NL Exhaust.

theRetrospect:Overcore.NAME: Overcore
theRetrospect:Overcore.DESCRIPTION: theretrospect:Construct 3 theretrospect:timelines and be theretrospect:Frozen for !M! turns.
theRetrospect:Overcore.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: theretrospect:Construct 3 theretrospect:timelines and be theretrospect:Frozen for !M! turn.

theRetrospect:Misdirection.NAME: Misdirection
theRetrospect:Misdirection.DESCRIPTION: theretrospect:Construct 1 theretrospect:timeline and play a random attack card from your discard pile.

theRetrospect:Transmute.NAME: Transmute
theRetrospect:Transmute.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 card. Gain energy equal to the card's cost.
theRetrospect:Transmute.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 card. Gain energy equal to the card's cost.

theRetrospect:Concurrency.NAME: Concurrency
theRetrospect:Concurrency.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each timeline you have.

theRetrospect:TapTheFuture.NAME: Tap the Future
theRetrospect:TapTheFuture.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Shuffle 2 *Empty to your draw pile.
theRetrospect:TapTheFuture.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Shuffle 2 *Empty to your draw pile.

theRetrospect:SleightOfHand.NAME: Sleight of Hand
theRetrospect:SleightOfHand.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Replay your last card this turn.

theRetrospect:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theRetrospect:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theRetrospect:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theRetrospect:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theRetrospect:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theRetrospect:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theRetrospect:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theRetrospect:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theRetrospect:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theRetrospect:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theRetrospect:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theRetrospect:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theRetrospect:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
